hero.title: Ori-OS roadmap
hero.subtitle: A high-level view of what we're working on now, next, and later. We prioritize work that improves activation, retention, and compliance.

now.name: Improved onboarding flows
now.description: Guided setup for agencies and consultancies, including templates for first campaigns and pipelines.

now.name: Deeper workspace reporting
now.description: Richer per-workspace dashboards and cross-workspace views for agencies.

now.name: More automation templates
now.description: Ready-to-use workflows for common use cases like new client onboarding, re-engagement, and handovers.

next.name: Native CRM connectors
next.description: Official integrations with popular CRMs (such as HubSpot or Pipedrive) to keep key fields in sync.

next.name: Expanded task & project views
next.description: More robust task boards and views so agencies can treat Ori-OS as an operating system for client work.

next.name: Enhanced consent and preference controls
next.description: Deeper support for managing consent and communication preferences alongside lawful-basis fields.

later.name: Template marketplace
later.description: A curated set of workflows, campaigns, and workspace templates shared by Ori-OS and partners.

later.name: Partner and implementer portal
later.description: Dedicated tools for RevOps freelancers and agencies who implement Ori-OS for clients.

later.name: Vertical-specific playbooks
later.description: Opinionated setups for specific verticals like SaaS, consulting, or industrial B2B.

footer.note: This roadmap is not a guarantee or contract. Priorities can change based on customer feedback, security, and market conditions.
